mean_cn: v. 使神圣，（用宗教仪式）授予……以某种职位
mean_en: to officially make (something, such as a place or building) holy through a special religious ceremony
word_etyma: con一起 + secrate神圣的 → consecrate 祝圣，圣化
sentence: We consecrate the temple by lighting candles and chanting.
sentence_trans: 我们通过点蜡烛和诵经来使这座寺庙神圣化。
